page.title: 02My House
page.content: My house has six rooms;a kitchen,a bathroom,a front room and three bedrooms upstairs.The walls outside are a smooth light brown. Two {bedrooms are small}and one bedroom is larger.The small bedrooms have blue wallpaper and the larger bedroom pink. {The front room is big}and has flowery wallpaper with a picture on the wall. Init are four armchairs,a bar,a settee,a radio and a television set. In the kichen the wallpaper has a flowered pattern also.There is a sink,a gas cooker,a refrigerator, a washing machine and two cupboards. The bathroom is blue with white tiles. Outside there is a small garden at the front and a large garden at the back.
